Title: 187: How Data Science is Becoming a Science
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Principal Data Scientist at OXXO, Favio Vázquez. You will hear about Data Science finally becoming a Science, learn the 5 characteristics of Data Science projects, and know the 3 different kinds of people who explore Data Science.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/187
